data.name: Emperial Knights
data.detailed_description:
You incarnate as a powerful knight of the Emperial Kingdom to bring justice and honor through your adventure in the world. Fast Paced Action Combat and Open World Adventure.

Features:

Classes : Create your own character with a progression. The classes are : Warrior, Ranger, Mage, Assassin, Pistolero.

Parkour : You can wall climb/run or slide anything, anytime.

Tower of Infinite : Spawning waves of monsters and bosses infinitely.

PVP : Press Tab, Hover your mouse on your friend and Press P in order to duel them on a deadly duel.

Party : Group up with your friends and start an adventure together.

Local Multiplayer : Host and Join games via IP address.

data.short_description: You incarnate as a powerful knight of the Emperial Kingdom to bring justice and honor through your adventure in the world. Fast Paced Action Combat and Open World Adventure RPG.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
